headline: More Green Endowment? It’s Not Easy
abstract: Students at the University of the South sought more transparency and sustainability. Were they too polite?
lead_paragraph: SEWANEE, Tenn. — In 2013, the Board of Regents at the University of the South endorsed a sustainability plan. The school pledged, among many other things, to disclose its endowment holdings and initiate a communitywide discussion about whether those investments matched its values and commitment to the environment.
